tool.name: CombineNNOutputFiles

param.name: inputfiles
param.dialogReference: • Paths of a set of RBN, FUZ, or PNN files in order of increasing partition number.
param.pythonReference: • Paths of a set of RBN, FUZ, or PNN files in order of increasing partition number

param.name: outputfile
param.dialogReference: • Path of combined RBN, FUZ, or PNN file.
param.pythonReference: • Path of combined RBN, FUZ, or PNN file

tool.summary: This tool is used to combine the RBN, FUZ, or PNN partitioned files created by GeoXplore from the partitioned Class file made with Partition NN Inputs. Each run of the tool will combine one type (RBN, PNN, or FUZ) into one large file of the same type.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool is used to combine the RBN, FUZ, or PNN partitioned files created by GeoXplore from the partitioned Class file made with Partition NN Inputs. Each run of the tool will combine one type (RBN, PNN, or FUZ) into one large file of the same type.
